root.description: This table is used by the WFPCTRANS program to translate percent language contained in vendor-keyed data. !!! PLEASE NOTE THIS TABLE IS USED FOR SESSION LAW DATA ONLY !!! All 256 possible %'s must be listed (from %00 to %FF) Begin % code in column 1 and the new string in column 9 This table was copied from WLAWDB.PROD@B.SYSIN(PCT2HEXT).
